param.name: TemplateStyle

param.description: The Main Color Variation for the Template

param.label: Left Column Width
param.description: The width for the Left Column (position=left)

param.name: layout_rightcol_width

param.description: The width for the Right Column (position=right)

param.description: Set the style for the Main Menu. One lines is a normal menu and Two lines is what you see at the demo

param.description: Enter the id for the menu which should corresponds with id on the main menu module on the module manager

param.name: mainnav_effect
